name: Xorple (itch)
description:
Not mobile friendly right now sorry :/

How To Play:

Type any 5 letter word and hit enter/return to try to guess the word of the day

Enter the same word twice to confirm your final answer

Try to figure it out!

Note: This is just the first release, there's going to be more features and glyphs in later versions, this is just an early build!

The Xorple standard model.
Starts with a random five letter word like wordle. The game itself is simple, but reading the results is a multi-part puzzle that may require scratch paper or notepad to complete.

The rules are written WITHIN THEIR SETS in ascending priority, meaning they shadow the rules above them.

As the game is played and rule conditions are met, they are applied from that point onward or until another rule shadows it.

Key:
|| or
&& and
If : then
= is 
TC turn counter (starts at 1)

🟩: right letter, right place
🟨: right letter, wrong place
⬛: wrong letter
🟥: ?

All conditions are comprised of tiles previously shown currently on the board at the time of your next guess not including your response of said guess

Zodiac rule set:

🌒🌓🌔:
♍♋♉♌=🟨
♊||♓||♈:♍♋♉♌=🟩

🌑:
♊♑♉♐♌♎♓♋♒♈♍♏=🟥,⛎=⬛

🌘||🌗||🌖:
♊♑♉♐♌♎♓♋♒♈♍♏=⬛,⛎=🟩

🌕:
|♊♑♉♐♌♎♓♋♒♈♍♏=🟩,⛎=⬛

♋&&♌:
♋,♌=🟩

♍&&♊:
♊=🟨,♍=🟩

Red circle set:

⭕=🟨

🟠||⬜||🟫:
⭕=🟥

TC ODD:
⭕=🟩

The Blingly Ruleset:

㊙️=🟥

🔞||⭕||🔶:㊙️=🟩

⛔=⬛

🚯=🟩

🚳,🚭=🟨

🚭||🚳:
⛔=🟥

Toxic Ruleset:

☢️,☣️=🟨

☢️&&☣️:
☢️,☣️=🟥
